tables.title: Route Complications
tables.description: Roadside snags and opportunities when caravans brave the wastes.

entries.result: A rusted bridge moans under weight; a truck bed gives way revealing cargo.
Storm sirens blare as acidic rain clouds roll in faster than forecast.
A rival convoy demands a toll of batteries to pass without a chase.
A patch of glowing moss hints at radiation ahead or a leaking reactor.
An abandoned radio tower still functions, broadcasting coordinates to shelter.
Bandit caltrops shred tires; a side route through crumbling suburbia beckons.
A mechanical scavenger offers trade: clean water for scrap circuitry.
A dust devil reveals a buried bunker hatch sealed with a biometric lock.
